availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Nisbet (Hopkins Co., Kentucky, physician )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, physician. Hopkins County, Kentucky, native. Son of James Nisbet and Mary Ann Nisbet. Married to Catherine Pemberton Nesbit in Hopkins County on October 29, 1856. Farmer and student in Hopkins County in 1850. Physician in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860. Physician in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 49B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 556.

Find A Grave, "Dr John Crittenden Nisbet (1831-1883)," Memorial #120322525, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/120322525 (accessed October 16, 2020).
